Articles.Content: I'm dead. Yay!
The wounds are so precise, its almost as if... Is there a ship I can borrow?

Laythe drowned in Laythe

- - - Updated - - -

You can have the Discovery's Pursuit shuttle.
(oh the irony)
What a twist!
I need to go check on the attractor station
I`ll stay here and take your duties as well as mine for now.

ok, and we still left that quarantine of the attractor space, right?

- - - Updated - - -

rushes to the shuttle bay, have a pilot meet me at the shuttle.
yEP!!

Good, I'll report my findings as soon as I am able to... I hope I'm wrong about this...

- - - Updated - - -

several hours later:

Ok, arriving at the border of Attractor space...was there this much debris in this area of space when we were last here?
[is this gonna be like a Borg thing? It feels like it. That'd be cool!]
From the Xannarian War maybe

I just came across some identifiable debris...my goodness...I found the identity plate from a ship...some of the wreckage is from the...Kellerman...I just sent this ship in to join the blockade a few weeks ago...detecting escape pods, no distress beacon from any of them, either none of the crew had time to get to the pods or...whoever attacked them, picked them up...

Moving in deeper into the territory...silent running

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [is this gonna be like a Borg thing? It feels like it. That'd be cool!]

(oh, I hope not... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

[Oh but it should! This is perfect... I need to start making plans for this! Maybe I could be part of them, or hold off until the last second, then show up in a garbage can or something. Oh hey, look at that...]

(lol)

Ok, nearing the base...seems quie..hang on, detecting unknown energy signatures. Oh s\*\*\*, I got 7 unknown battleships in orbit above the base and the attractor. Guys, I THINK I might need some back up, you got a fleet somewhere nearby that can draw these guys off long enough for me to get into the base?

It was Xannari

- - - Updated - - -

Discovery is en route
[Actually I think I'll just stick with the garbage can. At least I can have whatever pizza isn't finished]

Emergency fleet is on its way

- - - Updated - - -

Mmmmmm..... Pizza

- - - Updated - - -

Pizza

- - - Updated - - -

PIZZA
Copy that, we'll get behind an asteroid to avoid being detected, remotely sent your IFF to the ship recognition in the base's computer, you are free to enter.
K-Drive Activated
S\*\*\*, they detected us, incoming fighters, doing the best we can to avoid being hit! I have personally taken control!

We have 15 cruisers on the way.

I'm getting an unknown signature..... 32 ships..... Origin..... What? No... No.... It can't be.....

(Maybe have the same role as picard in that one episode.)

WHY ARE THERE SO MANY DIPLOMATS! BLAAAAAARGH!
They're coming out of the Attractor!

> 
> (Maybe have the same role as picard in that one episode.)
> WHY ARE THERE SO MANY DIPLOMATS! BLAAAAAARGH!

(NOW who's job is the toughest! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))
